downloadTitle: Microsoft Rights Management sharing application for Mac
downloadDescription: RMS sharing app enables you to view protected files that others have shared with you (.ppdf, .ptxt, .pxml, .pjpg, .pjpeg, .ppng, .ptiff, .pgif, .pbmp, and .pfile file extensions).
detailsSection:
NOTE: You need to have RMS for individuals or an RMS enabled Office 365 account to use Microsoft Rights Management sharing application (RMS sharing app). You can register at https://portal.aadrm.com. You cannot use Microsoft Account (Live, Hotmail or Outlook.com) account to sign in.

By downloading the software, you agree to the license terms provided here as EULA.htm. If you do not agree to the license terms, do not download the software.
installInstructionSection: RMS sharing app lets you breathe easy knowing your files are safe and can only be opened by users you trust and share with.
